name: I Was Always Filled With Anger
name_original: I Was Always Filled With Anger
description:
I Was Always Filled With Anger 

Soon it will be dark and you must say goodbye.

Simply use the arrows to move

A game poem by Raphaël Dely, Axel Rannou & Max Romain

Any donation is immensely appreciated

If you're interested in this kind of work, I also have a Patreon.
